content: with this free r24 chain 1 work 1 half_double_crochet in same st & in each st to end join to 1st half_double_crochet 70 pattern be sure to check my shop for other designs to love www ravelry com/ fo and weave in ends use my invisible finish technique for a clean finish designers/liz-mcqueen http //playinhookydesigns blogspot com/p/invisible-finish html show off your work by adding your finished hat to the projects page on ravelry www ravelry com/patterns/ library/brain-waves-beanie copyright @ 2010 - 2017 liz mcqueen aka playin hooky designs you may use this pattern for personal use gifts & charity sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit playin hooky designs w/ the original design under the creative commons attribu- tion-share alike license no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author no video tutorials may be made using this pattern 10 thank you please email me your questions follow me to be the first to see new projects promotions and all things playin hooky play hard … play hooky facebook www facebook com/playinhooky email liz@playinhookydesigns com ravelry www ravelry com/people/playinhooky blog with all my photo tutorials playinhookydesigns blogspot com/ instagram instagram com/playinhooky pinterest pinterest com/lizmcqueen81/ newsletter sign-up mad ly/signups/77435/join website www playinhookydesigns com/
